h:head.h:title: South Sudan: F5 - SCHOOL WASH SURVEY FORM SCH/STH

text.value: Is there tissue/paper for use after defecating?
0 Poor (presence of flies, offensive odour and visible stool on floor, absence of roof/door)
3 Good (clean, odourless, no flies, presence of roof and door)
1 Fair (presence of roof/door but dirty floor)
0 Poor (presence of flies, offensive odour and visible stool on floor, absence of roof/door)
4 Excellent (Very clean, odourless, presence of door, roof, and availability of water)
Pit latrine without slab or pit
Observer: is there water or tissue for use after defecating?
If yes, ask to visit the toilet â€“what type of toilet is it?
Is there a toilet in the school?
Surface water (river, creek, dam, lake, stream, canal)
1 Equal or less than 15 minute round trip from the school
Pit latrine without slab or pit
Is there a source of drinking water in the school?
If yes, where is the source of drinking water?
2 Longer than15 minute round trip from the school
4 Excellent (Very clean, odourless, presence of door, roof, and availability of water)
Observer: is there provision for hand washing after toilet use?
Surface water (river, creek, dam, lake, stream, canal)
Are there accessible water bodies close to the school?
Is there water for washing hands after using the toilet
3 Good (clean, odourless, no flies, presence of roof and door)
If yes, what type of water source (circle all that apply)
Observer: what type of hand washing facilities
Has this school received deworming treatment (Albendazole/Mebendazole) in the last six month?
Observer: What is the condition of the toilet?
2 Longer than15 minute round trip from the school
1 Equal or less than 15 minute round trip from the school
1 Fair (presence of roof/door but dirty floor)

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Invalid. Recorder ID code is 2 numbers long.
Invalid. Recorder ID code is 3 numbers long.

input.hint: 3 digit code assigned to this school
